template.p: You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

ul.li: The CRM App capture customer leads and help turn them into contracts with automated workflows.
The Rental App will centralize rental contracts, billing cycles, availability, and reservations.
The Invoicing App supports recurring billing, deposits, late fees, and equipment damage charges.
The Inventory App will manage the physical stock of machines, keep track of detail serial numbers,track usage and returns.
The Field Service App manages delivery, installation, on-site intervention schedules as well as regular servicing and reduces downtime by planning maintenance cycles.

template.p: By uploading this module's demo data, your database has been filled with a few products, sale orders and more.
You should be able to execute the following flows to have an overview of various flows you can quickly execute with this package using Odoo.
Of course, this is just an overview of the features included in this package. Feel free to add new apps, delete/modify demo data, and test everything around!

Field Service allows you to plan on-site interventions, assign tasks, and ensure preventive maintenance is carried out on time.

li.p: Generate tasks automatically when equipment is moved to maintenance location.
Handle recurring tasks based on runtime readings.
Assign technicians with calendar view and route optimization.
Log service reports directly from a mobile device.

Setup the recurring maintenance rules you need per product.
As soon as a serial exceeds the maintenance run-time increment, a recurring maintenance task will be created!
Similarly, as soon as a reception check is failed and the serial sent to Maintenance location, a field task for its maintenance is created and ready for technician to fix the issue!
